perturbation.original_text: 1.3 "iMine Products" shall mean those Products known as cryptocurrency mining rigs and its parts and components, as JRVS and the Distributor shall maintain and modify from time to time.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.3 "iMine Products" shall mean those products currently listed on the iMine website. JRVS reserves the right to change product specifications without notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text implies a collaborative maintenance and modification process between JRVS and the Distributor. The modified text removes the distributor from that process and states JRVS can change product specifications without notice. This omission introduces uncertainty in product specification agreements.

perturbation.original_text: 5.1 JRVS Price. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the Distributor shall pay for the Products at the then current price of JRVS (the "JRVS Price") at the time of placement of the Order. 5.2 Price Change. JRVS shall have the right to revise JRVS Price at any time. Price changes shall apply to all purchase orders received after the effective date with the notice, except that any price increase shall be effective immediately upon notice to Distributor and apply to those accepted but undelivered orders.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.1 JRVS Price. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the Distributor shall pay for the Products at a price determined by JRVS. 5.2 Price Change. JRVS shall have the right to revise prices at any time. Price changes shall apply to all purchase orders without prior notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text provided specific conditions for price changes, including when they would take effect. The modified text removes these restrictions, giving JRVS greater latitude in changing prices with no prior notice, contradicting the expectation of informed consent. This omission makes payment obligations ambiguous.

perturbation.original_text: 10. LIMITED WARRANTY 10.1 Sole Warranty. THE SOLE WARRANTY, IF ANY, PROVIDED IN CONNECTION WITH THE PRODUCT SHALL BE PROVIDED BY THE COMPONENT MANUFACTURER. JRVS MAKES NO WARRANTIES TO THE DISTRIBUTOR OR CUSTOMERS. 10.2 Warranty Period. JRVS shall NOT provide a warranty of any kind for each of the Products against defects in material and workmanship under normal use and service from the date of delivery to the Distributor. 10.3 No Other Warranty. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED IN THIS SECTION 10, JRVS PROVIDES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY, OR OTHERWISE, AND SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ANY WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, WITH RESPECT TO THE PRODUCT AND DOCUMENTATION.
perturbation.changed_text: 10. LIMITED WARRANTY 10.1 Sole Warranty. THE SOLE WARRANTY, IF ANY, PROVIDED IN CONNECTION WITH THE PRODUCT SHALL BE PROVIDED BY THE COMPONENT MANUFACTURER. 10.3 No Other Warranty. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED IN THIS SECTION 10, JRVS PROVIDES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY, OR OTHERWISE, AND SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ANY WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, WITH RESPECT TO THE PRODUCT AND DOCUMENTATION.
perturbation.explanation: By omitting section 10.2, the statement saying JRVS shall NOT provide a warranty of any kind is omitted. Without that statement, there is no written contractual denial of warranty from JRVS to the distributor. The omission of the middle statement conflicts directly with the statement made just before it.
